statements.select:
WITH CodeList (ID, Code, CodeLevel, HierID) AS ( SELECT AA.ID as ID , AA.Code as Code , 1 AS CodeLevel , CAST(RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.Name, AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) as HierID FROM dbo.ACCode AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND AA.Code = #ParentCode#
AND AA.ParentCode IS NULL
UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID as ID , AA.Code as Code , BB.CodeLevel + 1 AS CodeLevel , CAST(BB.HierID+ '-' + RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SortOrder, AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HierID FROM dbo.ACCode AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CodeList BB ON AA.ParentCode = BB.Code WHERE 1=1
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BB.HierID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, BB.HierID , REPLICATE(' ', (BB.CodeLevel -1) * 5) + CASE WHEN BB.CodeLevel = 1 THEN '▷ ' ELSE '▶ ' END + AA.Name as HierName , BB.CodeLevel
, AA.Code , AA.Name , AA.Value , AA.ParentCode , AA.Description , AA.UseYn , AA.SortOrder , AA.MaxLength , AA.CodeValue01 , AA.CodeValue02 , AA.CodeValue03 , AA.CodeValue04 , AA.CodeValue05 , AA.CodeValue06 , AA.CodeValue07 , AA.CodeValue08 , AA.CodeValue09 , AA.CodeValue10 FROM dbo.ACCode AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CodeList BB on AA.ID = BB.ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.Code LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' OR AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName , AA.Code , AA.Name , AA.Value , AA.ParentCode , AA.Description , AA.UseYn , AA.SortOrder , AA.MaxLength , AA.CodeValue01 , AA.CodeValue02 , AA.CodeValue03 , AA.CodeValue04 , AA.CodeValue05 , AA.CodeValue06 , AA.CodeValue07 , AA.CodeValue08 , AA.CodeValue09 , AA.CodeValue10 FROM dbo.ACCode AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.ACCode ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, Code, Name, Value, ParentCode, Description, UseYn, SortOrder, MaxLength, CodeValue01, CodeValue02, CodeValue03, CodeValue04, CodeValue05, CodeValue06, CodeValue07, CodeValue08, CodeValue09, CodeValue10 ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #Code#, #Name#, #Value#, #ParentCode#, #Description#, #UseYn#, #SortOrder#, #MaxLength#, #CodeValue01#, #CodeValue02#, #CodeValue03#, #CodeValue04#, #CodeValue05#, #CodeValue06#, #CodeValue07#, #CodeValue08#, #CodeValue09#, #CodeValue10# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update: UPDATE dbo.ACCode SET ParentCode = #Code# , UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName= #UpdateByName# WHERE ParentCode = ( SELECT Code FROM dbo.ACCode WHERE ID = #ID# ); UPDATE dbo.ACCode SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName= #UpdateByName# , Code = #Code# , Name = #Name# , Value = #Value# , ParentCode = #ParentCode# , SortOrder = #SortOrder# , Description = #Description# , UseYn = #UseYn# , MaxLength = #MaxLength# , CodeValue01 = #CodeValue01# , CodeValue02 = #CodeValue02# , CodeValue03 = #CodeValue03# , CodeValue04 = #CodeValue04# , CodeValue05 = #CodeValue05# , CodeValue06 = #CodeValue06# , CodeValue07 = #CodeValue07# , CodeValue08 = #CodeValue08# , CodeValue09 = #CodeValue09# , CodeValue10 = #CodeValue10# WHERE ID = #ID#;
statements.delete: DELETE FROM dbo.ACCode WHERE ParentCode = ( SELECT Code FROM dbo.ACCode WHERE ID = #ID# ); DELETE FROM dbo.ACCode WHERE ID = #ID#;
